name: Poltergeist Heist
description:
In this game you play as a scientist that is battling a terminal brain cancer and is trying to search for a cure, upon finding parchment that has the cure the soul protecting it becomes alive as a poltergeist, takes the parchment and tears it up sending it across dimensions, the player must travel through the game levels avoiding the spikes and the enemies to find each parchment to save the player!

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Down

D - Move Right
